job.title: Data Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtAbout UsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAt Turquoise were making healthcare pricing simpler more transparent and lower cost for everyone Have you or a family member ever gotten an MRI or a lab or even a straightforward surgery without knowing the cost in advance Thats bonkers right Were going to fix thatltbrgtltbrgtWeve already launched our consumerfacing website that allows anyone to search and compare hospital insurance rates  something never before possible Now were rolling out a suite of new products for providers payers and patients to clean up the healthcare transaction We want to change how the industry works from the inside outltbrgtltbrgtWere a seedstage startup backed by top VCs More importantly were a multitalented group of folks moonlighting as authors bass players improv instructors chefs linguists and trivia buffs with a big passion for improving healthcare Were eager to find ambitious yet wellrounded teammates to join us on this missionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThe RoleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWere looking for a driven entrepreneurial candidate that wants to impact healthcares broken payment infrastructure We value creative outsidethebox thinkers that back their ideas with revenue cycle expertise technical knowledge and action This role will be a key support function for a new product line and inform product development and feature releasesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtIn this role you will ltbrgtltstronggtltulgt ltligtBe a subject matter expert and internal thought leader for Turquoise Healths price transparency managed care rate benchmarking and contract management dataltligt ltligtArchitect solutions for ingesting large amounts of healthcare payments data  claims contract rates and demographics data to name a fewltligt ltligtWrite and modify ingestion scripts in pythonltligt ltligtExplore and evaluate new data sources to incorporate into our product to improve our customer experienceltligt ltligtProvide client technical support as needed for our price transparency data productsltligt ltligtModify and continue to improve our data warehouseltligt ltligtHelp guide the data product roadmap with leadershipltligt ltligtDraft internal and external technical documentation ltligt ltligtFluidly meet the sporadic daily tasks of a small growing startupltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligt3 years hospitalpayer contracting experience and demonstrated current revenue cycle industry knowledgeltligt ltligt3 years experience writing python and SQLltligt ltligtMedical billing and coding knowledge is a plusltligt ltligtEntrepreneurial mindset you prioritize tasks with an eye for evolving business needs ltligt ltligtExpert communication of technical details in simple terms to clients and internal stakeholdersltligt ltligtTeam player with zero egoltligt ltligtAbility to work effectively in a remote environmentltligt ltligtGood problemsolving skillsltligt ltligtBachelors degree or equivalent experienceknowledge We are happy to work with strong candidates with nontraditional educational backgroundsltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltugtltstronggtBenefitsltbrgtltstronggtltugtltulgt ltligtHealth Care Plan Medical Dental ampamp Visionltligt ltligtUnlimited Time Offltligt ltligt401K  Matchingltligt ltligtFamily Leave Maternity Paternityltligt ltligtWork From Homeltligt ltligtStock Option Planltligt ltligtMonthly Wellness Benefitltligt ltligtAnnual Learning ampamp Development Benefitltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtJob LocationltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtTurquoise Health is a fully remote company based in the US Our founding team is located in California San Diego and London We work with team members and contractors in the US and around the world but we operate on US business hours and work with clients entirely based in the USltbrgtltbrgtFor this role we are generally seeking USbased candidates but we are willing to consider strong candidates in other countries
